meanings.definition: Analyzing or interpreting in psychological terms.
meanings.sent1: The psychologising approach helped us understand the behavior better.
meanings.sent2: She had a psychologising perspective on the situation.
meanings.sent3: The psychologising explanation of why the cat chased its tail was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her psychologising insights into human nature were truly enlightening.
meanings.sent5: The psychologising analysis of dreams made everything clearer.

meanings.definition: To engage in psychological analysis or interpretation.
meanings.sent1: He enjoys psychologising people's actions to understand them better.
meanings.sent2: She is always psychologising her own thoughts and emotions.
meanings.sent3: Psychologising why the chicken crossed the road can be quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The author was psychologising the characters' motivations throughout the book.
meanings.sent5: Psychologising the reasons behind behavior can lead to valuable insights.
